name: Green vs. Red
description: This is my submission for GMTK 2021 - Joined Together, which is my first time participating in a Game Jam. It's a pretty simple 2D Arcade shooter that follows the theme by having the player convert enemies to their side to be absorbed once they are defeated. I know there's a lot of areas in which I can learn more and improve in future projects, but I had fun putting this together. Thank you for playing!
